algorithm_technique: Count character frequencies. Palindromes can have at most one character with an odd count.
problem_summary_simple: Can we form k palindromes using all characters from a string?
problem_summary_technical: Determine if k non-empty palindromes can be formed from a string by analyzing character frequency parity.
key_insights: A palindrome can have at most one character with an odd frequency.
The number of characters with odd frequencies limits the minimum number of palindromes.
The total number of characters must be at least k.
